title: Constructing a Figure 4 Deadfall Trap
brief: Build a trigger system that drops a heavy weight to crush prey instantly.
steps: Step 1: Select three straight sticks and carve precise notches to hold them in figure-4 pattern under tension.
Step 2: Practice the trigger assembly beforehand - it requires close tolerances and precise angles.
Step 3: Position a heavy weight (rock or log) above the trigger that will kill or incapacitate prey immediately.
Step 4: Set the vertical stick into the ground with notch facing the direction prey will approach from.
Step 5: Balance the horizontal stick in the vertical stick's notch, supporting the diagonal stick.
Step 6: Position the diagonal stick to hold the weight, with its notch catching on the horizontal stick.
Step 7: Place bait on or near the horizontal trigger stick.
warnings: Weight must be heavy enough to kill immediately - wounded animals may escape.
Requires precise construction and practice to set reliably.
Trigger is sensitive and may go off accidentally during setup.
